org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe

Packages that use Recipe
Package
Description
org.bukkit
The root package of the Bukkit API, contains generalized API classes.
org.bukkit.event.inventory
Events relating to inventory manipulation.
org.bukkit.inventory
Classes involved in manipulating player inventories and item interactions.

    Subinterfaces of Recipe in org.bukkit.inventory
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    ComplexRecipe
    Represents a complex recipe which has imperative server-defined behavior, eg armor dyeing.
